thread.section_title: Park Plaza Victoria London - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very trendy, arty with frills
thread.title_full: Very trendy, arty with frills - Review of Park Plaza Victoria London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Peter C
title: Very trendy, arty with frills
text:
Stayed for a week at this hotel whilst on business.
Very comfortable stay; although perhaps a little too trendy for my taste.
Pro's:-
1. Good service
2. Smart contemporary decor throughout
3. Excellent rooms with good bathroom
4. Good in-room facilities
5. Tasty food in restaurant
6. Swift room service (forgot to bring my Ice though!)
Con's:
1. Hi-Tech in-room control feature did not control A/C in my room. Despite having such advanced technology on hand I was unable to cool my room! (Nice idea if it works)
2. Expensive Bar food. Not great value for money.
Overall - happy during my stay. Hotel is great. Trendy, arty types will really love it!
